message.body: Hey, forgot to ask one thing about your friend's thing this weekend. Does he have cats or dogs? Alan is extremely allergic to them, particularly cats. Thanks!
Oh, good question! I'll double check but I'm 99.99% sure he doesn't have any pets
Awesome, thanks. I always forget to ask, and we end up having to suddenly leave as soon as we get to someone's house. Anyways...see ya tomorrow!
Haha that can't be fun...I'll let you know tomorrow. Have a good one! :-)
